txt.en: 'These battle-plans you brought me -- as I read them, it appears to me that these foes are already on the move towards Floodwend! You have hindered what may have been a second assault.\n\n'Make haste, [placeholder]! You must return to our Thane, young Radwig, and tell him of the approaching Easterlings and their friends from Mordor.'

'The Easterlings dare to come, do they? I do not care what allies they have; they will not take this city while I yet live. Let them come. Tell me everything you know of their movements, [placeholder].'
At Etta's bidding, you gave what assistance you could to North-torr, but the signs are clear: Floodwend is in great danger.
Warn Thane Radwig of the approaching forces of Mordor
Thane Radwig and his mother Etta are in the Mead Hall of Floodwend.\n\nYou should head to the Mead Hall of Floodwend and tell the Thane and Etta of the enemy movements in the Wold.
